STATE
v.
WHITFIELD & BANNER 282P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 31, 2018 Jillian C. Katz, Assistant Appellant Defender, for Whitfield, Christopher Jamme.

Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender.

Leslie C. Rawls, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Banner, Corey Levi. Jonathan P. Babb, Special Counsel to Attorney General, L. Michael Dodd, Special Deputy Attorney General, Roxann L. Vaneekhoven, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th of August 2018 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:
